alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 4:43AM CDT until July 06 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Western Custer County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 442 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Arnett to 6 miles south of Crawford to 5 miles northwest of Allison, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Oklahoma Mesonet. At 425 AM, a 59 mph wind gust was reported near Arnett. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Hammon, Leedey, Reydon, Sweetwater, Strong City, Angora, Moorewood, Crawford, Roll, Foss Reservoir, Berlin, and Dempsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills
